Description: Very good condition overall, has some dings, chips and scratches, all cosmetic, see photosPlays and sounds incredible, I modified it to my preferences, i.e. the three way switch and the PRS 57/08 pickups that are in it now,(my favorites) but I have included and original white frames,along with the original 5 way p/u selector, The frets still have plenty of life left in them, the guitar was played a good bit bit but never in a full time band situation, smoke free in my studio and the same for the guy I bought it from years ago.The neck is straight and true and is a wide standard shape I believe, definitely not thin.It pre-dates the 10 Top and birds, but as you can see it would have easily been labeled a "10"The back cover plate was re-signed by Paul a few years ago, after the original ink wore off.This guitar plays incredible, has beautiful Brazilian rosewood on the fretboard, full 24 fretsIncludes OHSCContact me please with any questions, Rich **No international shipping!!
Title: VINTAGE 1988 PRS Custom 24 / Incredible Black-burst / Brazilian Rosewood frt brd
Subtitle: Happy 30th Anniversary!! Includes all original parts
ConditionDescription: Used, very good condition at 30 years oldHas a few dings, chips and scratches, mostly on the headstock, Top is almost perfectNeck is straight and no buzzing at all, frets are still very good, best playing guitar I own
